name: GlimmerFall
description:
Project for the 1st FarmandoXP game jam https://itch.io/jam/1jamfarmandoxp

Theme: Light

Controls

Movement: WASD / Arrow keys

Jump: Space

Dash: Mouse 1 / Ctrl


A young demon boy,

Smashed an ancient jar,

Releasing a fairy's joy,

That shimmered like a star.

The demon gave chase,

Through the night so dark,

But was met with grace,

By fairies' radiant spark.
